description:
Espresso provides a topbar icon that allows you to disable or enable the screensaver and auto suspend. You can also define other conditions that will disable the screensaver and auto suspend such as when any application is running in full screen mode and/or when any one of a defined list of applications is running.
Espresso has been fully derived from a fork of Caffeine and provides the same functionality.
name: Espresso
